entry.title: New OA repository: Sophiahemmet University College Publications

entry.title: OA repository Linnaeus University Publications re-organized
entry.content:
The former repositories of Vaexjoe University and Kalmar University (Sweden) have grown together to
Linnaeus University Publications.
The new basicurl is http://lnu.diva-portal.org/dice/oai.
The former basicurls http://www.diva-portal.org/oai/vxu/OAI and http://www.diva-portal.org/oai/hik/OAI are still responding but deliver deleted records information only.
The repository is hosted by DIVA Uppsala.

entry.title: New OA repository: Akten der Reichskanzlei. Weimarer Republik, Bundesarchiv, Germany
entry.content:
The edition Akten der Reichskanzlei. Weimarer Republik has been launched.
The OAI-PMH basicurl is: http://www.bundesarchiv.de/aktenreichskanzlei/1919-1933/connect/oairepos_all.xml (all metadata) and http://www.bundesarchiv.de/aktenreichskanzlei/1919-1933/connect/oairepos.xml (volume level).
The OAI-PMH interfaces behave as a "static repository", thus responding with the same file for all OAI-PMH verbs.

entry.title: New OA repository : ORKA - Open Repository Kassel
entry.content:
The ORKA - Open Repository Kassel of Univ. Kassel, Germany presents the
digital collections of the University Library Kassel.
The basicurl is: http://orka.bibliothek.uni-kassel.de/oai.
The repository has been established with the Goobi platform software.

entry.content:
The National Taiwan University of Science and Technology Institutional Repository has changed the OAI-PMH basicurl to now:
http://ir.lib.ntust.edu.tw/dspace-oai/request

entry.title: eEast-UkrNUIR has improved the metadata quality
entry.content:
eEast-UkrNUIR, the Electronic Volodymyr Dahl East-Ukraine National University Institutional Repository has improved the DC response. The urls delivered in dc:identifier are operable now.
The basicurl is http://dspace.snu.edu.ua:8080/oai/request

entry.title: La Biblioteca Virtual de Andalucía has migrated the basicurl
entry.content: La Biblioteca Virtual de Andalucíahas changed the basicurl to now:http://www.juntadeandalucia.es/cultura/bibliotecavirtualandalucia/catalogo/OAIHandler.

entry.title: eArchives of Indiana University - Purdue University, Indianapolis has migrated the basicurl
entry.content:
eArchives of Indiana University - Purdue University, Indianapolis has migrated the basicurl to now:
https://archives.iupui.edu/oai-pmh/request.

entry.title: DSpace＠Kanagawa Institute of Technology (Japan) has migrated
entry.content:
DSpace＠Kanagawa Institute of Technology (Japan) has migrated.
THe new frontpage url is: http://www.repository.lib.kanagawa-it.ac.jp/dspace/.
The new basicurl is http://www.repository.lib.kanagawa-it.ac.jp/dspace-oai/request.

entry.title: Vtext Digital Repository has changed the OAI-PMH basicurl
entry.content:
The Vtext Digital Repository of Valdosta State University, has migrated.
The frontpage url has switched to http://vtext.valdosta.edu:8080/xmlui/.
The new basicurl is: http://vtext.valdosta.edu:8080/oai/request

entry.title: TEGRA of Universad de la Salle, Colombia has changed the OAI-PMH basicurl
entry.content:
TEGRA, the repository of Universad de la Salle, Colombia has changed the OAI-PMH basicurl to now:
http://tegra.lasalle.edu.co/oai/request.
The repository frontpage has moved to http://repository.lasalle.edu.co/tegra.

entry.title: MSpace at the University of Manitoba has changed the OAI-PMH basicurl
entry.content:
MSpace at the University of Manitoba, Canada has changed the OAI-PMH basicurl to now:
http://mspace.lib.umanitoba.ca/oai/request.

entry.title: Institutional Repository @ BRAC University has changed the OAI-PMH basicurl
entry.content:
The Institutional Repository @ BRAC University, Bangladesh has changed the OAI-PMH basicurl from earlier http://dspace.bracu.ac.bd:8180/oai/request to now:
http://dspace.bracu.ac.bd/oai/request.
The repository uses DSpace.

entry.title: New Repository: eSport of German Sport University Cologne
entry.content:
New OA repository: esport of German Sport University Cologne.
The basicurl is http://esport.dshs-koeln.de/cgi/oai2.
The repository uses EPrints.

entry.title: DSpace at University Leiden has switched the basicurl
entry.content: The DSpace at University Leiden has switched the basicurl (former http://openaccess.leidenuniv.nl/dspace-oai/request) to now: http://openaccess.leidenuniv.nl/oai/request

entry.title: Bayerische Staatsbibliothek München: Digitale Sammlungen has changed the basicurl
entry.content:
The repository of Bayerische Staatsbibliothek München: Digitale Sammlungen
has changed the basicurl to:
http://daten.digitale-sammlungen.de/OAI/oai2.php.

entry.title: NPUE IR of National Pingtung University of Education (NPUE), Taiwan has changed the basicurl
entry.content:
The NPUE IR of National Pingtung University of Education (NPUE) (國立屏東教育大學), Taiwan has changed its OAI-PMH basicurl to now http://140.127.82.166/ir-oai/request.
The repository uses DSpace.

entry.title: Queensland DPI&F eResearch Archive (eRA) has moved
entry.content:
The former Queensland DPI&F eResearch Archive (eRA) has moved to eRA, the Queensland Department of Employment, Economic Development and Innovation archive of scientific and research publications.
The basicurl has moved to now:
http://era.deedi.qld.gov.au/cgi/oai2.
The repository uses EPrints 3.1.3.

entry.title: Malmö University Electronic Publishing (MUEP) has modified the OAI-PMH basicurl
entry.content:
The Malmö University Electronic Publishing (MUEP) repository has modified the basicurl and is now accessible via
http://dspace.mah.se/oai/request

entry.title: OAI-PMH interface available for Publications from Karolinska Institutet
entry.content:
The OA repository Publications from Karolinska Institutet, medical unversity at Solna, Sweden is accessible via OAI-PMH now with the basicurl:
http://publications.ki.se/oai/request.
The repository uses DSpace.

entry.title: New OA Repository: OPUS - Online-Publikations-Server der Hochschule Osnabrück, Germany
entry.content:
New OA Repository: OPUS - Online-Publikations-Server der Hochschule Osnabrück, Germany is ready for harvesting with the basicurl: http://opus.bsz-bw.de/fhos/oai2/oai2.php.
The repository is hosted by BSZ Constance based on OPUS.

entry.title: E-Dissertationen der Universität Hamburg has switched the basicurl
entry.content:
E-Dissertationen der Universität Hamburg (listed at OpenDOAR) has switched the basicurl to:
http://ediss.sub.uni-hamburg.de/oai2/oai2.php.
The system uses OPUS.

entry.title: New OA repository: RODIN, Object Repository for Teaching and Research at the University of Cadiz
entry.content:
RODIN, Object Repository for Teaching and Research at the University of Cadiz, Spain is active now.
it is accessible via OAI-PMH with the basicurl:
http://rodin.uca.es:8081/oai/request.
The repository uses DSpace and delivers currently around 4100 metadata records.

entry.title: Norwegian Brage repositoires with improved OAI-PMH interface
entry.content:
The Norwegian Brage repositories hosted by Bibsys have improved their OAI-PMH interface and so the oai_dc response is fully OAI-PMH compliant now.
The BASE validator announces no errors anymore and thus BASE has started to activate the hosted repositories (currently 15 out of 30 are active in BASE).

An example is: UiS Brage, University of Stavanger with the basicurl
http://oai.bibsys.no/oai/repository/nora_uis_vitenskaplig

entry.title: New repository: Marine Institute Open Access Repository, Galway, Ireland
entry.content:
The Marine Institute Open Access Repository, Galway, Ireland is operable and delivers correct working urls now.
The basicurl is: http://oar.marine.ie/oai/request.
The system uses DSpace. Size today: 53 documents.

entry.title: Taiwan Theological College & Seminary Digital Repository has changed its urls
entry.content:
The Taiwan Theological College & Seminary Digital Repository has changed its homepage url (previous http://ir.taitheo.org.tw:8080/dspace/) and the basicurl to now http://ir.taitheo.org.tw:8080/ir-oai/request.
The repository uses DSpace.

entry.title: New OAI-PMH Repository: USFSP Digital Archive (University of South Florida St. Petersburg)
entry.content:
The USFSP Digital Archive of the University of South Florida St. Petersburg is accessible via OAI-PMH with the basicurl http://dspace.nelson.usf.edu/oai/request.
The repository uses DSpace.

entry.title: National Cheng Kung University Institutional Repository has again changed the basicurl
entry.content:
The National Cheng Kung University Institutional Repository, Taiwan
has changed its basicurl again from http://nckur.lib.ncku.edu.tw/ir-oai/request
to now http://ir.lib.ncku.edu.tw/ir-oai/request

entry.title: Digitum (Depósito de la Universidad de Murcia) has changed the basicurl
entry.content:
Digitum, Depósito de la Universidad de Murcia, Spain has changed the
basicurl to now:
http://digitum.um.es/oai/request.
The previous basicurl delivers empty responses only.

entry.title: OACIS of Tokyo University of Marine Science and Technology (TUMSAT) is accessible via OAI-PMH
entry.content:
OACIS the (Open Access Collection of International and Scholarly Papers) of Tokyo University of Marine Science and Technology (TUMSAT) (東京海洋大学), Japan is available via OAI-PMH with the basicurl: http://oacis.lib.kaiyodai.ac.jp/dspace-oai/request.
The system uses DSpace.

entry.title: New Repository: HilDok (University of Hildesheim, Germany)
entry.content:
HilDok Publication Server of the University of Hildesheim, Germany is active now.
The OAI-PMH basicurl is http://opus.bsz-bw.de/ubhi/oai2/oai2.php.
The repository is hosted by the BSZ Constance and is based on OPUS.

entry.title: Migrated repository: RiuNet with new url and new basicurl
entry.content:
RiuNet, the repository of Universitat Politècnica de València has
changed the basicurl from earlier http://dspace.upv.es/dspace-oai/request to now
http://riunet.upv.es/oai/request.
The repository uses DSpace.

entry.title: New repository: Te Tumu Eprints Repository with OAI-PMH interface
entry.content:
The Te Tumu Eprints Repository of Univ. of Otago, New Zealand
is accessible via OAI-PMH with the basicurl
http://eprintstetumu.otago.ac.nz/perl/oai2

entry.title: ElAr, Open Electronic Archive of Kharkov National University of Radioelectronics is accessible via OAI-PMH now
entry.content:
The Open Electronic Archive of Kharkov National University of Radioelectronics, Ukraine (EAIR) is accessible via OAI-PMH now.
The basicurl is http://open-archive.kture.kharkov.ua/oai/request
The system uses DSpace.

entry.title: Colecciones Digitales Uniminuto with OAI-PMH basicurl now
entry.content:
The Colecciones Digitales Uniminuto
of Corporación Universitaria Minuto de Dios, Colombia has a operable basicurl now:
http://dspace.uniminuto.edu:8000/oai/request

The system uses DSpace

entry.title: National United University Institutional Repository with modified basicurl
entry.content:
The National United University Institutional Repository, Taiwan has modified the basicurl to
http://rep.nuu.edu.tw/ir-oai/request

entry.content: The OPuS-Publikationsserver, Berufsverband Information Bibliothek e.V. (BIB) has modified the basicurl and is now only accessible via http://www.opus-bayern.de/bib-info/oai2/oai2.php

entry.title: UNED Madrid with modified basicurl
entry.content: The Repositorio de la UNED of UNED (Universidad Nacional de Educación a Distancia), Spain has migrated to the new basicurl: http://e-spacio.uned.es/fez/oai.php

entry.content:
Theses de l'ULP of Univ. de Strasbourg, France has changed the OAI-PMH basicurl to
http://scd-theses.u-strasbg.fr/perl/oai2
The repository has changed the frontpage url too.

entry.title: National Central University Institutional Repository (NCUIR), Taiwan uses a modified basicurl
entry.content:
The National Central University Institutional Repository (NCUIR),
Taiwan uses a modified OAI-PMH basicurl now:
http://ir.lib.ncu.edu.tw/ir-oai/request.


The repository uses the DSpace software.

entry.title: Feng Chia University Repository now accessible
entry.content:
The Feng Chia University DSpace repository, Taiwan delivers correct working handles via OAI-PMH now.

The basicurl is http://dspace.lib.fcu.edu.tw/oai/request.
